Module progettofinale.sailingclub

Package progettofinale.sailingclub.controller

package progettofinale.sailingclub.controller
The controller package contains all the controller classes to manage the various fxml files in the application.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    progettofinale.sailingclub
    The progettofinale.sailingclub package contains all the various packages and classes to make the application work; specifically it contains the SailingClubClientApp class which contains a main to launch the client side application, the SailingClubServer class contains a main to launch the server side application and the ServerThread class which is used by the server to handle all client requests.
    progettofinale.sailingclub.communication
    The communication package contains the classes that are relevant to the application to determine the various entities.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Controller
    The Controller class represent the controller superclass where there are methods and functions used by the LoginController, MemberController, PaymentController, RegisterController, StaffController subclasses.
    LoginController
    The class LoginController represent the controller where we can control all the buttons and functionality of the Login fxml file.
    MemberController
    The class MemberController represent the controller where we can control all the buttons and functionality of the Member fxml file.
    PaymentController
    The class PaymentController represent the controller where we can control all the buttons and functionality of the Payment fxml file.
    RegisterController
    The class RegisterController represent the controller where we can control all the buttons and functionality of the Register fxml file.
    StaffController
    The class StaffController represent the controller where we can control all the buttons and functionality of the Staff fxml file.
